Dialog.Name: Dialog001
Dialog.MainInstruction: Are you sure you want to change the password on this account?
Dialog.Content: Microsoft Windows protects certain information with a user's password, making it impossible to access that information if the user's password is reset. You should only reset a password if the user has forgotten his or her password and does not have a password reset disk.\nRead more.

Dialog.Name: Dialog002
Dialog.MainInstruction: Do you want Windows to automatically install updates?
Dialog.Content: With automatic updates, Windows periodically checks for new security updates, program improvements, etc. and installs them for you.

CommandLink.Explanation: Your computer will be more vulnerable to security problems until you turn on automatic updates.
